entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
